title: How long do i have to wait to be able to gift a friend if i just added them?
body: I have RP on my main account and i wanted to gift champions to my new account, i added my account as a friend but when i type in the name all i get is, " No items matched your search criteria".  i need to know how long this wait time is?? As soon as possible preferred.

replies.body: It's not too long!  Per the [gifting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ), it will take about a day.  Make sure to check out the other requirements just in case too!  Let me know if that clears things up!
Took exactly 24 hours, it cleared up i appreciate your comment!
